import React from'react';import useTransactions from'../hooks/useTransactions';const TransactionItem=_ref=>{let{transaction}=_ref;const{editTransaction,deleteTransaction}=useTransactions();const handleDelete=()=>{deleteTransaction(transaction.id);};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("li",null,transaction.type,": ",transaction.amount," (",transaction.category,")",/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("button",{onClick:()=>editTransaction({...transaction,amount:transaction.amount+10})},"Edit"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("button",{onClick:handleDelete},"Delete"));};export default TransactionItem;
